t: How to Create Your Own Brand on Amazon & Why You Should
s: March 2, 2023 - A brand, for the purposes of selling on Amazon, is a group of related products with a similar identity. Consumers know what to expect when they buy the same brand. The products are similar, the packaging is similar, the customer service is similar, and the overall experience is similar.
